nodes.text: The Imperator-class Star Destroyer was a class of Star Destroyer used by the Republic Navy, which witnessed limited service at the end of the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems. They were considered a new design when brought into development at the end of the war. When the Republic transformed into the Galactic Empire, the Imperator-class was succeeded by the refined and renamed Imperial-class Star Destroyer which became the mainstay of the Imperial Navy.
